    • Method Detail

      • changeChannelDuty

        public void changeChannelDuty(int channelID,
                              int dutyValue)
                       throws TiDeviceException
        Change the channel duty to the buffer, have platform dependencies
        Parameters:
        channelID - the channel id[IN], range:0-7
        dutyValue - duty value[IN], range:0-255
        Throws:
        TiDeviceException - If a TiPWM error occurs
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If channelID or dutyValue value out of range

      • changePeriod

        public void changePeriod(int periodValue)
                  throws TiDeviceException
        Change the period to the buffer, have platform dependencies
        Parameters:
        periodValue - new period[IN],unit:us, 1Khz:1000us(default)
        Throws:
        TiDeviceException - If a TiPWM error occurs
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If periodValue value out of range

      • open

        public static TiPWM open(int portID,
                         int... channelIDs)
                  throws TiDeviceException
        Open the TiPWM port by port id,and return the object
        Parameters:
        portID - port id[IN], range:0-4
        channelIDs - channel id set[IN], channel id range:0-7
        Returns:
        TiPWM object
        Throws:
        TiDeviceException - If a TiPWM error occurs
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If portID value or channelIDs length out of range
